sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { BookService } from 'src/app/services/book.service'; import { UserService } from 'src/app/services/user.service'; import { NgbRatingModule } from '@ng-bootstrap/ng-bootstrap'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-book', templateUrl: './add-book.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-book.component.css'] }) export class AddBookComponent { addBookForm:FormGroup constructor(private formBuilder:FormBuilder,private bookService:BookService,private userService:UserService,private route:Router){ this.addBookForm=this.formBuilder.group({ bookName:"", author:"", description:"", genre:"", rating:"" }) } onAdd(){ const lentByUserId=this.userService.getUserIdFromToken(); const bookDetails={...this.addBookForm.value,lentByUserId}; console.log(bookDetails); this.bookService.addBook(bookDetails).subscribe((res)=>{ console.log(res); this.route.navigateByUrl("/dashboard"); }, (error)=>{ console.log(error); }) } }

Add New Book
